text.content: Focused on delivering powerful, aggressive strikes, Attack Maneuvers deal damage, and are the core of a martial character’s offensive toolkit—optimized for impact, precision, or area control.

The force of your Attack pushes the target away.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Weapon or Unarmed Strike

Make a Melee Martial Attack against the PD of a target within range, and it makes a Might Save against your Save DC. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike. Save Failure: The target is pushed 1 Space away from you. Save Failure (each 5): The target is pushed up to 1 additional Space.

Knock Prone: After the result, you can choose to reduce the total distance a target is pushed by 1 Space to knock them Prone instead.

Airborne: When you choose to push them upward into the air, the distance they’re pushed is halved.

Maneuver Enhancements

Increased Distance: (1 SP, Repeatable) The distance pushed increases by 1 Space.

Bowling Ball: (1 SP) If the target collides with another creature as part of this movement, they both take Collision Damage as normal, and the creature it collides with must make a Might Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: The target is knocked Prone. Save Failure (each 5): The target is also pushed 1 Space away from you.

You cause a creature to bleed with the ferocity and precision of your attack.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Weapon or Unarmed Strike

Make a Martial Attack against the PD of a target within range, and it makes a Repeated Physical Save against your Save DC. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike. Save Failure: The target becomes Impaired for 1 minute or begins Bleeding (your choice).

Maneuver Enhancements

Improved Bleed: (1 SP, Repeatable) The target gains a stack of Bleeding.

Improved Impaired: (1 SP, Repeatable) The target gains a stack of Impaired.

Weakened: (2 SP) The target gains a stack of Weakened.

You make a target vulnerable to Physical damage.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 2 SP
  • Range: Weapon or Unarmed Strike

Make a Martial Attack against the PD of a target within range, and it makes a Physical Save against your Save DC. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike. Save Failure: The target gains Physical Vulnerability (1) for 1 Round.

Maneuver Enhancements

Improved Vulnerability: (2 SP, Repeatable) The Vulnerability increases by 1.

Break DR: (1 SP) The target doesn’t benefit from PDR for the duration.

Break Resistance: (2 SP) The target doesn’t benefit from Physical Resistance for the duration.

You move around the area, attacking 1 creature you pass along the way.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Weapon or Unarmed Strike

You move a number of Spaces up to your Speed and make a Melee Martial Attack against the PD of 1 target within your Melee Range at any point during this movement. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike.

Maneuver Enhancements

Disengage: (1 SP) This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Subsequent Strike: (1 AP and 1 SP, Repeatable) You gain additional movement equal to half your Speed and you can target an additional creature using the same Attack Check.

A mid-air strike.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Weapon or Unarmed Strike

Your Jump Distance increases by 2, you Jump up to your Jump Distance without spending movement (provided you can move), and make a Melee Martial Attack against a target within range at any point during your jump or where you land.

Reaction: You can spend an additional 1 SP to perform this Maneuver as a Reaction to a creature being forcibly moved into a Space within your Jump Distance that’s at least 1 Space above the ground.

DC Tip: Remember, your Long Jump Distance equals your Jump Distance in Spaces, and your High Jump distance equals your Jump Distance in feet.

Maneuver Enhancements

Slam Down: (1 SP, Repeatable) If the target is in the air, it makes a Physical Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: The creature is knocked downward 2 Spaces.

DC Tip: This knockback completely changes the direction the target was moving.

Falling Strike: (1 SP) The creature makes a Physical Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: The creature falls Prone.

Impact Crater: (1 AP + 1 SP) All creatures within 1 Space of where you land must make a Physical Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: The creature falls Prone.

You swing wide to attack targets around you.

  • Cost: 2 AP
  • Range: 1 Space Arc (Self)

Make an Area Martial Attack against the AD of every target within range. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike.

Reach Weapon: If you have a Reach Weapon, you can extend the Point of Origin 1 Space away from you. The Arc must still be facing away from you.

Maneuver Enhancements

Damage: (2 SP, Repeatable) The damage increases by 1.

Area: (2 SP, Repeatable) The Arc increases by 1 Space.

Careful Cleave: (1 SP, Repeatable) You can choose 1 target in the area to avoid with the Attack.

You attack in a circle around you, attacking everyone within range.

  • Cost: 2 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: 1 Space Aura

Make an Area Martial Attack using a Melee Weapon or Unarmed Strike against the AD of every target within range. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike.

Reach Weapon: If you have a Reach Weapon, you can choose to increase the Aura by 1 Space. When you do, you can’t Attack targets within 1 Space of you.

Maneuver Enhancements

Damage: (2 SP, Repeatable) The damage increases by 1.

Area: (2 SP, Repeatable) The Aura increases by 1 Space.

Vortex: (2 SP, Repeatable) Each target makes a Might Save. Save Failure: The target is pushed up to 1 Space horizontally in a direction of your choice. The target is moved 1 additional Space each time you use this Enhancement.

You attack every creature in a line.

  • Cost: 2 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: 4 Space Line (Self)

Make an Area Martial Attack with a Melee Weapon or Unarmed Strike against the AD of every target in a 4 Space Line. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike.

After Attacking, you can move to any Space within 1 Space of the area without provoking Opportunity Attacks from the targets and without spending your movement.

Reach Weapon: If you have a Reach Weapon, you can extend the Point of Origin 1 Space away from you. When you do, the Line must extend in a direction away from you.

Maneuver Enhancements

Damage: (2 SP, Repeatable) The damage increases by 1.

Increase Length: (1 SP, Repeatable) The length of the Line increases by 2 Spaces.

Carved Path: (2 SP, Repeatable) Each target makes a Might Save. Save Failure: The target is pushed 1 Space horizontally out of the area in a direction of your choice. The target is moved 1 additional Space each time you use this Enhancement.

You fire a powerful shot that pierces through creatures in a line.

  • Cost: 2 AP
  • Range: Ranged Weapon

Make an Area Martial Attack against the AD of every target within a 4 Space Line that’s Point of Origin is within Range. The Line must extend away from you. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon.

Maneuver Enhancements

Damage: (2 SP, Repeatable) The damage increases by 1.

Area: (1 SP, Repeatable) The length of the Line increases by 3 Spaces.

Penetrating Shot: (1 SP) The Attack ignores Cover but is blocked by 6 inches (15 cm) of wood or soft earth (dirt, mud, or sand), or 1 inch (25 mm) of metal or rock.

You bombard an area with a series of projectiles.

  • Cost: 2 AP
  • Range: Ranged Weapon

Make an Area Martial Attack against the AD of every target within a 2 Space Diameter Sphere that’s Point of Origin is within Range. Hit: The target takes the damage of your Weapon.

Maneuver Enhancements

Damage: (2 SP, Repeatable) The damage increases by 1.

Area: (2 SP, Repeatable) The Diameter of the Sphere increases by 1 Space.

Rain of Fire: (1 SP) Targets within the area don’t gain the benefits of 1/2 Cover against this Attack.

Suppressive Fire: (2 SP) Each creature makes a Charisma Save. Save Failure: The creature becomes Hindered until the end of their next turn.

Defense Maneuvers reinforce durability and survival. Whether by parrying incoming blows, bracing against force, or redirecting attacks, these Maneuvers let martial characters hold the line and protect themselves or allies under pressure.

Reaction Maneuvers: Some Maneuvers allow you to use a Reaction when a creature is targeted by an Attack (such as Parry, Brace, and Evade). For such Maneuvers, you can wait until after the Check is made, but you must decide to use the Maneuvers before the GM says the result of the Check.

You deflect an attack.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: Self (or 1 Space if wielding a Melee Weapon or Shield)

Trigger: A target you can see within range (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its PD.

Reaction: You grant the target a +5 bonus to its PD against this Attack.

Maneuver Enhancements

Alert: (1 SP) The Attacker’s next Attack this turn against the target has DisADV.

Disarm: (1 SP) If the Attacker is within 1 Space of you or the target, they make a Physical Save. Save Failure: The target drops the Weapon used for the Attack to the ground once the Attack is resolved. Save Failure (5): You gain possession of the Weapon, provided you have a free hand to hold it.

You stand firm against an attack.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: Self (or 1 Space if wielding a Shield)

Trigger: A target you can see within range (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its AD.

Reaction: You grant the target a +5 bonus to its AD against this Attack.

Maneuver Enhancements

Targets: (1 AP, Repeatable) You can target 1 additional creature within range that’s also targeted by the same Attack.

Grapple: (1 SP) If the Attacker is within 1 Space of you, they make a Physical Save. Save Failure: The Attacker becomes Grappled by you once the Attack is resolved.

You avoid an enemy attack by quick repositioning.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: Self

Trigger: You’re targeted by an Attack.

Reaction: You impose DisADV on the Attack against you. You can move 1 Space after the Attack, provided you stay within range of the Attack.

Maneuver Enhancements

Evasion: (1 SP) You gain ADV on any Saves imposed by the Attack.

Disengage: (1 SP) Movement made as part of this Maneuver doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Slip Away: (1 SP) You can move up to your Speed instead of 1 Space and you no longer need to stay in range of the Attack.

You take damage for a nearby ally.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: 1 Space

Trigger: A target you can see within range is Hit by an Attack.

Reaction: The damage of the Attack is shared between you and the target. The damage you take bypasses any Damage Reduction you have.

Maneuver Enhancements

Targets: (1 AP, Repeatable) You can target 1 additional creature within range that’s also targeted by the same Attack.

Taunt: (1 SP) The attacker makes a Charisma Save. Save Failure: They are Taunted by you for 1 Round.

Heroic Protect: (2 SP) You become the target of the Attack, taking all of the damage and effects instead of the target. If the Attack is accompanied by a Save (as with a Dynamic Attack Save), you make the Save instead of the target.

Resistance: (1 SP) You gain Resistance (Half) to any damage you take from using this Maneuver. The cost of this Enhancement increases by 1 SP if you use the Heroic Protect Enhancement.

You push through an attack.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Self (or 1 Space if wielding a Shield)

Trigger: A target you can see within range (including yourself) is Hit by an Attack.

Reaction: The target takes 1 less damage from the Attack.

Maneuver Enhancements

Heroic Endure: (1 SP, Repeatable) The target takes 1 less damage from the Attack.

Steadfast: (1 SP) The target isn’t Vulnerable to damage from the Attack.

Repel: (1 SP) After the Attack, if the Attacker is within 1 Space of you or the target, they make a Might Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: They are pushed 1 Space away. Save Failure (each 5): +1 Space pushed.

You take a moment to catch your breath and refocus.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Self

Make a DC 10 Martial Check. Failure: You gain 1 Temp HP for 1 Round. Success: You gain 2 Temp HP for 1 Round. Success (each 5): +1 Temp HP.

Maneuver Enhancements

Increased Temp HP: (1 SP) You gain +2 Temp HP.

Physical Resolve: (1 SP) You gain ADV on Physical Saves for the duration.

Mental Resolve: (1 SP) You gain ADV on Mental Saves for the duration.

You swap places with a nearby ally.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: 1 Space

You swap Spaces with a willing creature within range. If you or the target creature provoke Opportunity Attacks as a result of swapping Spaces, those Attacks are all made against you.

Reaction: You can spend an additional 1 SP to perform this Maneuver as a Reaction in response to a creature within 1 Space being Attacked. When you do, you also impose DisADV on the Attack against them.

Maneuver Enhancements

Escape: (1 SP) The target can immediately move up to its Speed after swapping Spaces.

Seamless Swap: (1 SP) Swapping Spaces doesn’t provoke any Opportunity Attacks.

Grapple Maneuvers specialize in close-quarters control: pinning, restraining, or throwing enemies. These Maneuvers allow a combatant to dominate a single opponent by controlling their movement and actions.

You slam a Grappled creature.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: Melee

Make a Melee Martial Attack against the target’s AD. Hit: The target takes 1 Bludgeoning damage.

Maneuver Enhancements

Multi-Slam: (1 AP + 1 SP, Repeatable) This Attack targets another creature you have Grappled.

Charging Slam: (1 AP + 1 SP, Repeatable) You move up to your Speed pulling the Grappled creatures with you. 1 Grappled creature takes additional damage equal to the number of Spaces moved as you slam them.

Wall Rake: (1 AP + 1 SP, Repeatable) You slam 1 Grappled creature into a wall within 1 Space and move up to your Speed along the wall, ending your movement within 1 Space of the wall. The target makes a Repeated Might Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: They gain 1 stack of Bleeding per Space moved.

DC Tip: Remember that you are Slowed while Grappling a creature, so you would move half as far. If you gain an ability that let’s you move without being Slowed while Grappling a creature, you could move the full distance.

You restrain a grappled target.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Melee

You make a Martial Check against the target’s Repeated Physical Save. Contest Success: The target is Restrained until the Grapple ends or they succeed on their Repeated Save.

DC Tip: A creature can spend 1 AP to attempt to break a Grapple (see Grapple Action for more information).

Maneuver Enhancements

Prone: (1 SP) The target also falls Prone (you don’t fall Prone unless you choose to do so).

Chokehold: (2 SP) The target also can’t speak or breathe until they are no longer Restrained by you.

You reposition a grappled creature to shield yourself from damage.

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Melee

Trigger: A creature that’s not Grappled by you Hits you with an Attack.

Reaction: Make a Martial Check against the Grappled target’s Might Save. Check Success: The damage from the Attack is shared by you and the Grappled creature, and you can move the Grappled creature to any Space adjacent to you immediately afterwards.

DC Tip: If the triggering Attack involved a Save (as with a Dynamic Attack Save) that moves you or your Grapple target out of your reach, you can still perform this Maneuver to resolve the damage (as if it the Hit happens moments before the forced movement).

Maneuver Enhancements

Switch: (1 SP) After you complete the Reaction, you switch places with the Grappled target. This movement doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks against either you or the target.

Partial Block: (1 SP) Your portion of the shared damage is reduced to 0.

Full Block: (2 SP) The Grappled creature takes all the damage from the Attack instead.

• Cost: Throw (1 AP)
  • Range: Melee

When you throw a creature using the Throwing rules, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you do, you’re considered to be performing a Maneuver.

DC Tip: Remember, throwing a creature ends the Grapple.

Maneuver Enhancements

Increased Throw: (1 SP, Repeatable) The target is thrown 1 Space further.

Skyward: (2 SP) Your throw distance isn’t halved for vertical throws.

Prone: (1 SP) The target also falls Prone.

Utility Maneuvers offer battlefield versatility beyond direct combat. They may include repositioning, movement tricks, environmental interaction, intimidation, or setting up allies for success. These Maneuvers shift the flow of battle through clever use of space and timing.

You take a moment to catch your breath and refocus.

  • Cost: 1 AP
  • Range: Self

You attempt to spend Rest Points to regain HP equal to the Rest Points spent. Make a DC 15 Martial Check. Failure: You can spend 2 Rest Points. Success: You can spend up to 3 Rest Points. Success (each 5): You can spend 1 additional Rest Point.

Maneuver Enhancements

Increased Healing: (1 AP or 1 SP, Repeatable) You can spend 1 additional Rest Point.

Repeat Save: (1 AP or 1 SP) You can repeat a Save against an effect you’re subjected to.

When you take the Pass Through Action, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you add a Maneuver Enhancement (or perform the Action using SP), you’re considered to be performing a Maneuver.

Stamina Action: You can now spend 1 SP instead of 1 AP to perform the Pass Through Action.

Maneuver Enhancements

Brush Past: (1 SP) The creature’s Space isn’t considered Difficult Terrain for this movement. You don’t provoke an Opportunity Attack from them if you leave their reach as part of the same movement.

Let’s Go: (1 SP) If you Succeed, you can pull a willing creature within 1 Space of you to an unoccupied Space within 1 Space of the creature you pass.

You run through a line of enemies.

  • Cost: 2 AP
  • Range: Self

You move in a Line up to your Speed. Make a Martial Check. Each creature within the Line must make a Martial Check contested against your Check when you attempt to move through its Space. Contest Success: You can move through the creature’s Space. Contest Failure: You’re unable to move through the creature’s Space, preventing you from moving any further.

Example: You make a Martial Check with a result of 15. If your Speed is 5, you can move up to 5 Spaces in a straight Line. If there are 3 creatures in that Line, your Martial Check of 15 would be compared to a Martial Check each creature makes as you attempt to pass through their Space, one by one. If the first creature in your path gets a 15 or higher, you can’t pass through their Space and stop moving.

Maneuver Enhancements

Brush Past: (2 SP) The Space of every creature who fails the contest isn’t considered Difficult Terrain for this movement. You don’t provoke an Opportunity Attack from them if you leave their reach as part of the same movement.

Trample: (2 SP) Every creature who fails the contest is knocked Prone.

Sprint across the battlefield

  • Cost: 1 AP + 1 SP
  • Range: Self

Make a DC 15 Martial Check. Success: You move up to twice your Speed ignoring Difficult Terrain. Failure: You move up to your Speed ignoring Difficult Terrain.

Reaction: You can spend an additional 1 SP to perform this Maneuver as a Reaction at the end of a creature’s Turn moving half as much as normal.

Maneuver Enhancements

Passthrough: (2 SP) Each creature whose Space you attempt to move through must make a Martial Check against the result of your Martial Check. Failure: You move through their Space.

Coordinated Movement: (2 SP, Repeatable) A willing creature of your choice within 1 Space can move without spending its own movement, provided they’re able to move and they end their movement within 1 Space of your destination.

You perform a powerful taunt.

  • Cost: Taunt Action (1 AP)
  • Range: Taunt Action (10 Spaces)

When you take the Taunt Action, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you add a Maneuver Enhancement, you’re considered to be performing a Maneuver.

Maneuver Enhancements

Sustained: (1 SP, Sustained) The duration increases to 1 minute but each creature makes a Repeated Save.

Increased Range: (1 SP) The range increases by 5 Spaces.

Legendary Taunt: (1 SP) Creatures other than you have Resistance (Half) to damage dealt by the Taunted targets, provided the target isn’t also Taunted by those creatures.

Mass Taunt: (1 AP + 1 SP) You instead target each creature of your choice within 5 Spaces that can see or hear you. When you choose this Enhancement, the cost of all other Enhancements (except Sustained) is doubled.

You perform a powerful intimidate.

  • Cost: Intimidate Action (1 AP)
  • Range: Intimidate Action (10 Spaces)

When you take the Intimidate Action, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you add a Maneuver Enhancement, you’re considered to be performing a Maneuver.

Maneuver Enhancements

Sustained: (1 SP, Sustained) The duration increases to 1 minute but each creature makes a Repeated Save.

Increased Range: (1 SP) The range increases by 5 Spaces.

Frightened: (1 SP) Targets are Frightened instead.

Mass Intimidate: (1 AP + 1 SP) You instead target each creature of your choice within 5 Spaces that can see or hear you. When you choose this Enhancement, the cost of all other Enhancements (except Sustained) is doubled.

You perform a powerful shove.

  • Cost: Shove Action (1 AP)
  • Range: Shove Action (1 Space)

When you take the Shove Action, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you add a Maneuver Enhancement, you are considered to be performing a Maneuver.

Maneuver Enhancements

Increased Push: (1 SP, Repeatable) The distance pushed increases by 1 Space.

Stand Up: (1 SP) If you’re Prone, you can stand up before or after making the Check without spending movement.

Mass Shove: (1 AP + 1 SP) You instead target each creature of your choice within a 1 Space Aura. When you choose this Enhancement, the cost of all other Enhancements (except Stand Up) is doubled.

You perform a powerful jump.

  • Cost: Extend Jump Action (1 AP)
  • Range: Self

When you take the Extend Jump Action, you can add the following Maneuver Enhancements. When you add a Maneuver Enhancement (or perform the Action using SP), you’re considered to be performing a Maneuver.

Stamina Action: You can now spend 1 SP instead of 1 AP to perform the Extend Jump Action.

Maneuver Enhancements

Instant Jump: (1 SP) If performing a Standing Jump, your Jump Distances isn’t halved.

Increased Jump: (1 SP, Repeatable) Your Jump Distance is increased by 2 for the Jump.

Heroic Landing: (1 SP, Repeatable) You reduce any damage from falling by 2 for the Jump.
